name: A3P (itch)
description:
A3P is an online multiplayer, 3rd person shooter, real time strategy, indie game. About:

A3P features online multiplayer with a great community, and PvP experience; with a variety of great weapons and special abilities to choose from! Download it now to join or host your own game server on the live server list!

Download:

Click the download button and follow the instructions included on the Itch.io page.

Server Setup:

In order to setup a game server on the public server list there are a two steps...

Step 1: In order for other people to connect to your game server via the server list, you must portforward your local ip on port 1337, THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT!

Step 2: Finally start a game server either in game by clicking the "Host" option on the main menu or running the command "a3p.exe -d map_name_here".

Disclaimer:

The game is still in early development therefor, many things are subject to change drastically...
